text: Wendy Irving (born 11 November 1951) is a Canadian equestrian. She competed in two events at the 1972 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian female equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Canada Category:Equestrians at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Ottawa Category:Equestrians at the 1971 Pan American Games Category:Pan American Games medalists in equestrian Category:Pan American Games gold medalists for Canada
title: Wendy Irving
